title: Handle Removal of Contingencies
description: The buyer is satisfied with their investigations and is ready to remove their inspection and appraisal contingencies.

tasks.description: Receive instructions from the buyer's agent to remove the contingencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: TC gets an email from the agent confirming the buyer is moving forward.

tasks.description: Draft the contingency removal form, specifying which contingencies are being removed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct legal form is filled out, listing the inspection, appraisal, and loan contingencies.

tasks.description: Send the form to the buyer for signature and then deliver the signed copy to the seller's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: The form is fully executed and delivered, making the buyer's deposit non-refundable.
